Cranbourne East: Located in the prestigious and tightly held Cascades on Clyde estate sits this astonishing 4 bedrooms plus study delight! Boasting an enormous 713m2 block! This home ticks all the boxes and more!
A top tier home in a top tier estate, with an array of separate living zones, elegant outdoor entertaining area with alfresco, this exquisite residence is sure to suit even the pickiest of buyers.
The large scaled master comes complete with walk in robes and a full ensuite which includes dual vanities and a double shower space with inbuilt recesses, while the remaining guest bedrooms all have built in robes of their own, not to mention the added convenience of the study having built in space for robes to be put in making it easy to convert into a 5th bedroom.
The hostess kitchen is a chef's dream and is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, 600mm range hood, 5-burner gas cook top, walk in pantry, tiled splash back, ample overhead storage and bench space. Not to mention cathedral styled ceilings. All of this overlooking your separate meals zone!
Not only is this home fitted out with top quality fixtures and fittings it also presents a grand capacity to accommodate even the largest of families, this is truly an entertainers delight with multiple living zones on offer!
Step through your sliding doors and be greeted by fully decked alfresco area, this will provide the perfect setting to entertain family and guests of all sizes or to simply retire after a long day or week and enjoy a good book.
Added features include: ducted heating & split systems for cooling, ceiling fans in all rooms, down lights throughout, side & internal access and two separate outdoor entertaining areas!
Surrounded by top end properties and is within walking distance to picturesque wetlands, this home boasts convenience. Other estate features include Class- A recycled water ensuring lush gardens year round, over 14 hectares of parkland and public open space, public BBQ facilities, playgrounds and walking tracks.
Those who are business savvy will appreciate this Telstra smart community positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. Minutes away from freeway access enroute to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, the recently constructed Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre and the Town Centre. Not to mention just seconds away from the newly developed Selanda rise and hunt Club village shopping centres.
From front to back this home was completed with an exceptional eye for detail and will be the perfect residence for those that expect nothing but the best!
